title: How to Cook a Roman Sweet Cake

steps.headline: Mix the flour and baking powder together.
steps.description: You can sift the flour if you wish but it is not necessary and the more roughage in the cake, the better.

steps.headline: Blend the rosemary, almonds and cinnamon.
Combine sherry (or substitute), grape juice and honey.
Pour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and stir, adding the milk while stirring.
Pour mixture into round or loaf tin lined with baking paper.
Bake for 25 - 30 minutes, less if browning too much.
Coat it with honey if you want.

text: Assemble ingredients.  Heat the oven to 190ºC (375ºF).  Mix the flour and baking powder together. You can sift the flour if you wish but it is not necessary and the more roughage in the cake, the better. Blend the rosemary, almonds and cinnamon. Add to the flour mixture. Combine sherry (or substitute), grape juice and honey.  Pour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and stir, adding the milk while stirring.  Pour mixture into round or loaf tin lined with baking paper.  Bake for 25 - 30 minutes, less if browning too much.  Coat it with honey if you want.  Ready!
